string.text:
A small package of activated charcoal which can absorb all sorts of toxins, gases, salts and heavy metals. Recommended to use after consuming strong medicine or alcohol.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]HEALING:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] Restores 2%hp on use
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] very potent alcohol sobering effect
